column4: Hello, I have a probleme on booth Ubuntu Intrepid and ubuntu Hardy: Whene I load a japanese pdf file, I can't read japanese caractere http://pastebin.com/ZgzYAcfB and when I install cmap-adobe-japan1, it is still unreadable and I have these messages on terminal: http://pastebin.com/biX9hC51   so what are the packages I have to install?
